Detailed Description

template<typename T>
class SharedMemory< T >

A class responsible for an object of a given type allocated in a shared-between-processes memory.
Parameters:
T The type of the shared object. The type must be primitive or a struct of primitives types.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

template<typename T >
SharedMemory< T >::SharedMemory ( const string &  pathName,
char  id,
bool  freeOnExit = true 
) [inline]

Creates a shared memory segment containing an object of type T. The memory of the object is zero-initialized and it's constructor is not called. The shared memory is attached to the calling process.

Parameters:
pathName A path to an existing file
id A char to identify the shared memory object.
freeOnExit Whether the physical shared memory segment should be deallocated when the SharedMemory is destroyed.

template<typename T >
SharedMemory< T >::~SharedMemory (  )  [inline]

Detaches the shared memory from the calling process and, in case freeOnExit is true, the physical shared memory is deallocated. The destructor of the shared object is never called, and it shouldn't be necessary, as it should be a primitive object with no resources to deallocate.

Member Function Documentation

template<typename T >
T& SharedMemory< T >::get (  )  [inline]

template<typename T >
const T& SharedMemory< T >::get (  )  const [inline]

Returns a reference to the shared object.
